definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
see 大馬哈魚|大马哈鱼[da4 ma3 ha3 yu2]

pinyin: da4 lin2 da2 ma2 ha3 yu2

definition: Damali or Tamali township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan/same as Taimali 太麻里[Tai4 ma2 li3]
Damali or Tamali township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan/same as Taimali 太麻里[Tai4 ma2 li3]
(bird species of China) Eurasian bittern (Botaurus stellaris)

sentences.english: "Be clean!" And immediately the leprosy left him.
sentences.chinese: 大麻疯立刻就离了他的身。

sentences.english: "Yeah, " he says. "Hector has the good shit."
sentences.chinese: “好啊，”他说，“赫克托耳有上好的大麻烟。”

sentences.english: What if he used cedarwood to hide the pot smell?
sentences.chinese: 若他用香柏掩盖大麻的气味呢？

sentences.english: I mean you can't walk into a restaurant, roll a joint, and start puffin' away.
sentences.chinese: 我是说，你不能叼着大麻走进一家餐馆，然后开始抽。

sentences.english: You mean – have you actually smoked marijuana?
One aspect of the invention is concerned with cannabimimetic pyrazole analogs.
sentences.chinese: 本发明一方面涉及拟大麻吡唑类似物。

sentences.english: When their linseed is ripe for harvest the hemp is in bloom in our field.
sentences.chinese: 他们的亚麻籽成熟收获时，我们田间的大麻正在开花。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the analytical method for cannabinol in the hemp seed oil by means of high-performance liquid chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立火麻仁油中大麻酚的高效液相色谱测定方法。

sentences.english: I rap for listeners, blunt heads, fly ladies and prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 我为聆听者，大麻叶而说唱，也能让女士，囚徒。

sentences.english: Why does this fellow send someone to me to be cured of his leprosy?
sentences.chinese: 这人竟打发人来，叫我治好他的大麻疯。

sentences.english: The marijuana he carried was confiscated and destroyed, according to police. (Chris Hondros/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 根据警方的消息，他携带的大麻被已没收和销毁。

sentences.english: Interestingly, anandamide is also produced naturally in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，大脑也会天然分泌内源性大麻素。

sentences.english: Katherine could smell the high sweet scent of marijuana.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳可以闻到大麻浓厚的甜蜜芬香。

sentences.english: The student cuffed his joint so the teacher wouldn't see it.
sentences.chinese: 那名学生把大麻烟藏在手里以防被老师发现。

sentences.english: Isn't there a bag of reefer someplace with your name on it?
sentences.chinese: 这里什么地方有一袋上面有你名字的大麻吗？

sentences.english: Marijuana seeds should only be soaked until the taproot has emerged.
sentences.chinese: 只应大麻种子浸泡，直到主根已经出现。

definition: cocaine (loanword)/also written 可卡因[ke3 ka3 yin1]
